pkgmetadata.longdescription: Helpers for Data Analysis and Presentation Focused on Undergrad Psychology // A teaching project for the display of statistical tests as well as some convenience functions for data cleanup. The primary components are the functions prefixed with 'tadaa_', which are built to work in an interactive environment, but also print markdown tables powered by 'pixiedust' for the creation of 'RMarkdown' reports. This package is no longer actively developed.
